If you find yourself in Barcelona all of a sudden, this is the one tapas bar you should not miss!  Barcelona has many, and most are mere overpriced tourist traps.  But Celta does Tapas like John Holmes did aspring actresses...  Deliciously hard!?  Anyway....   Get the Octopus!  Eat the Octopus!  Wash the Octopus down with a refreshing Estrella Damm!  At the heart of every great city is amazing food.  Bar Celta Pulperia does not disappoint.  And, it didn't give me diarrhea!
